dataset.data:
Open a browser https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo
Find the checkbox beside "I'm not a robot" and click it.

Open a browser https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo
Find the checkbox beside "I'm not a robot" and click it. If a popup opens asking to find images with a specific content (like bicycles, stairs or something like this) extract what is exactly asked for and click all images with the given content. after that click verify

Open a browser https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo
Find the checkbox beside "I'm not a robot" and click it. Solve the recaptcha.
